Cutoff Instructions: Cut off when an individual is no longer serving as a Capstone official.
Transfer Instructions: Transfer to the National Archives 15 years after cut off.  Delete all other versions, such as those existing in live systems and agency archives.

Cutoff Instructions: Cutoff of email will be at the end of the calendar year.
Transfer Instructions: Transfer to NARA 15 years after cutoff.
Legacy Email Scope: The department does not maintain electronic mail in an electronic record keeping system.  Prior to adopting the Capstone approach, Federal records created or received by electronic mail are printed and filed in a traditional/manual record keeping system.
